meanings.definition: Of or relating to a font
meanings.sent1: The fontal design of the book cover caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The fontal style of the text made it easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The fontal arrangement of the letters seemed to dance on the page.
meanings.sent4: The fontal details of the typography added depth to the overall design.
meanings.sent5: The fontal characteristics of the typeface were elegant and modern.

meanings.definition: Located at or near the front or source
meanings.sent1: The fontal row of seats provided the best view of the stage.
meanings.sent2: The fontal position in the line allowed for quick access to the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The fontal parking spot was always taken first in the busy lot.
meanings.sent4: The fontal location of the store attracted many customers.
meanings.sent5: The fontal area of the garden received the most sunlight throughout the day.
